name: Attention
description: Attention is useful for looting containers. It increases the looting speed.
effects: Elite level: Chance of an instant find
Elite level: Doubles your looting EXP
raise: Uncovering Loot in Loot containers

name: Shotguns
description: Shotgun handling skill improves the overall handling and recoil of shotguns.
raise: Landing hits on enemies with Shotguns
Reloading Shotguns
Completing the quest Night Sweep (+2 levels)

name: Rocket Launchers
description: Launchers handling skill.

name: Immunity
description: Affects the susceptibility to illnesses and the effectiveness of their treatment.
effects: Reduction of all negative effects of stimulants, food and water (+50% at elite level)
Painkiller action time increased (+25% at elite level)
Decrease of poison's action force (+50% at elite level)
Elite level: Chance to have immunity to negative effects from stimulants, food, water
Elite level: Chance to have immunity to poisons
raise: Using stimulants with negative effects
Surviving negative stimulant and food effects

name: Mag Drills
description: Skill aimed at magazine handling - loading and unloading of ammo, checking for remaining cartridges.
effects: Magazine loading is performed faster with every loaded round
Increases speed of magazine check using the context menu
Increases precision of magazine check through the context menu
Elite level: Magazine checked instantly when moved to your inventory
raise: Check magazines for remaining ammo (in raid)
Load and unload magazines (in raid)

name: Metabolism
description: Healthy metabolism improves and extends the effects of eating and drinking, and sustains the physical skills longer.
effects: Reduction of time of action of all negative effects of stimulants, food, water
Enhances food and drink positive effects
Elite level: Zero chance of dehydration and exhaustion effects
raise: Replenishing Energy and Hydration through provisions
For efficient leveling you need to eat dehydrating food and then drink something
Completing the quest The survivalist path - Junkie (+2 levels)

name: Heavy Vests
description: Heavy body armor wearing skill reduces amount of received penetration health damage, explosive damage to health and armor and improves mobility.

name: Advanced Modding
description: Deft use of mutitool makes advanced modding quicker and less punishing for weapon mobility.

name: Pistols
description: Pistol handling skill improves the overall handling, reduces recoil and reload time of pistols.
raise: Landing hits on enemies with Pistols
Reloading Pistols

name: Prone Movement
description: Mastering the prone movement makes it faster and quieter.
raise: Crawling

name: Sniper Rifles
description: Sniper rifle handling skill improves the overall handling, reduces recoil and reload time of Sniper rifles.
raise: Landing hits on enemies with Sniper rifles
Reloading Sniper rifles
Unloading the chamber of Sniper Rifles
Completing the quest A Shooter Born in Heaven (+1 level)
Completing the quest Mentor (+3 levels)

name: Light Machine Guns
description: Light Machinegun handling skill improves the overall handling, reduces recoil and reload time of LMGs.
raise: Landing hits on enemies with Light machine Guns
Reloading Light machine Guns

name: Submachine guns
description: Submachine Gun handling skill improves the overall handling, reduces recoil and reload time of SMGs.
raise: Landing hits on enemies with Submachine guns
Reloading Submachine guns

name: Aim Drills
description: Mastering aim reduces aiming time and barrel sway immediately after aiming.
effects: Elite level: No hand shaking at any stamina value, first 2 seconds after aiming
Elite level: Reduced hands shaking during tremor and fracture, the first 2 seconds after aiming
raise: Land hits on enemies while aiming down sights.

name: Intellect
description: High intellect boosts the speed of item examination, lock picking, and improves the quality of weapon repairs.
effects: Elite level: You do not need a manual for item examination
Elite level: Guess container contents without searching
raise: Examining
Lockpicking
Repairing weapons
Completing the quest Psycho Sniper (+2 levels)
Crafting items in the hideout

name: Stress Resistance
description: Stress resistance improves the chances of withstanding injury shock, shaking hands, and tremors.
effects: Decreases chance of getting pain shock (-50% at elite level)
raise: Breaking legs by falling.
Being on low health
Having the "Pain" debuff
Taking damage.
Completing the quest Psycho Sniper (+1 level)
Completing the quest The survivalist path - Cold blooded (+1 level)
Completing the quest The survivalist path - Wounded Beast (+1 level)

name: Lockpicking
description: Lock picking skill.

name: Perception
description: Mastering perception increases the hearing distance, improves aiming concentration and makes detection of nearby loot easier.
raise: Finding and picking up all kinds of Loot
Completing the quest The survivalist path - Eagle-owl (+0.5 level)
Completing the quest The survivalist path - Tough guy (+1 level)
Completing the quest Psycho Sniper (+2 level)

name: Revolvers
description: Revolver handling skill.
raise: Landing hits on enemies with Revolvers
Reloading Revolvers

name: Throwables
description: The throwing weapons handling skills allow you to throw grenades farther and with less energy consumption.
effects: Elite level: Throws do not require energy and fatigue does not affect accuracy
raise: Using Throwable weapons

name: Sniping
description: Sniping skill reduces recoil when aiming, especially when prone, and allows to hold breath longer.

name: Charisma
description: Charisma affects the prices offered by merchants and the rate of gaining reputation with them.
effects: Elite level: You are the first to know the latest trading news
Elite level: Increases profit from every transaction
raise: Whenever you gain EXP for Attention, Perception or Intellect you also gain EXP for Charisma.

name: Assault Rifles
description: Assault rifles handling skill improves the overall handling, reduces recoil and reload time of Assault rifles.
effects: Reduces weapon recoil (-25% at elite level)
Increases reload speed (+20% at elite level)
Increases weapon switching speed (+40% at elite level)
raise: Landing hits on enemies with Assault rifles and Assault carbines
Reloading Assault rifles and Assault carbines

name: Weapon Maintenance
description: Weapon service and maintenance skills.
effects: Reduced gun wear (up to 50%) when firing
Reduced probability of wear during repair (up to 60%)
Elite level: No wear during a repair
raise: Repairing weapons in the stash.

name: Melee
description: Melee weapons handling skill.
effects: Increases reload speed (+20% at elite level)
Increases weapon switching speed (+40% at elite level)
Reduces weapon recoil (+20% at elite level)
raise: Landing hits on enemies with Melee weapons

name: Light Vests
description: Light body armor wearing skill improves mobility and reduces the amount of received penetration and melee damage to your health.

name: Searching
description: The search skill mastering allows you to search bodies and containers faster and more efficiently.
effects: Elite level: Allows you to search multiple containers at once
raise: Searching Loot containers and corpses

name: Troubleshooting
description: Troubleshooting skill facilitates rectification of weapon malfunctions.
effects: Increases troubleshooting speed (up to 50%). 1% for each skill level.
Elite level: Reduces the chance of malfunctions based on the durability of weapons by 50% after fixing a malfunction caused by the same reason
Elite level: Reduces the chance of malfunctions from a cartridge by 50% after fixing a malfunction caused by the same reason
Elite level: Reduces the chance of malfunctions from the magazine by 50% after fixing a malfunction caused by the same reason
Elite level: Automatically detect the type of a weapon malfunction as soon as it occurs, without inspecting the weapon
raise: Clearing weapon misfires

name: First Aid
description: First aid skills make use of first aid kits quicker and more effective.

name: Recoil Control
description: Greater control over recoil reduces horizontal spread, making the recoil more predictable.
effects: Improves recoil control (-20% at elite level)
raise:
Shoot with any Weapon, skill point gain is based only on number of times shot.
Firing about 30-rounds during a raid will reach diminishing returns. This can be done right before exfil, preferably with cheap bullets.
Firing about 30-rounds during a raid will reach diminishing returns. This can be done right before exfil, preferably with cheap bullets.

name: Hideout management
description: Efficient hideout management allows you to use less fuel and filters in production, and increases bonuses from different Hideout zones.
effects: Decreases fuel, air and water filter consumption rate (0.5% per level) (-25% at Elite Level)
Increasing all percentage bonuses from Hideout zones (1% per level) (+50% at Elite Level)
Elite level: +2 slots for fuel canisters
Elite level: +2 slots for water filters
Elite level: +2 slots for air filters
Elite level: +2 to the storage limit of coins in a bitcoin farm
raise:
Crafting items in the hideout
0.4 point per craft
0.1 point per 10 resources spent on filters or fuel
0.4 point per craft
0.1 point per 10 resources spent on filters or fuel
Upgrading modules of the hideout (+8 points per upgrade)

name: Night Operations
description: Operating at night makes movement easier, and experience grows faster than usual. And, of course, it reflects on the prices of night vision devices.

name: Vitality
description: Vitality improves your chances of surviving a wound by decreasing the possibility of bleeding and instant death through critical damage of a body part.
effects: Decreases chance of bleeding (-60% at elite level)
Decreases chance of dying by losing a limb (-20% at elite level)
Elite level: All bleedings stop on their own (Note: This means after bleeding occurs, the bleeding will stop after a few seconds)
raise: Taking damage
Bloodloss
Completing the quest Ambulance (+1 level)
Completing the quest The survivalist path - Combat medic (+2 levels)

name: Underbarrel Launchers
description: Underbarrel grenade launcher handling skill.

name: Surgery
description: The ability to perform field surgery may save your life in critical situations. The better you learn this skill, the faster and better you will perform operations.
effects: Elite level: No HP penalty for the restored body part
Elite level: Maximum increase in the speed of surgery (+40% at Elite Level)
raise: Use CMS or Surv12 field surgical kits on a blacked out limb.

name: Health
description: Good health speeds up the recovery from the damage sustained in the raids, decreases the probability of fractures and lowers the energy and dehydration rate.
effects: Decreases chance of fractures (-60% at elite level)
Decreases energy consumption (-30% at elite level)
Decreases dehydration rate (-30% at elite level)
raise: Whenever you gain EXP for Strength, Endurance or Vitality you also gain EXP for Health.
Completing the quest An Apple a Day Keeps the Doctor Away (+2 levels)

name: Memory
description: Trained skills last longer before they start to fade.
effects: Decreases the rate at which you forget skills
Elite level: Now you won't forget any skills
raise: Whenever you gain EXP for a skill that is not physical or memory itself you also gain EXP for Memory.

name: Crafting
description: Improving the crafting skill reduces the production time of items, including those produced cyclically.
effects: Decreases the time of all cyclic production except for the bitcoin farm
Elite level: The ability to craft up to two different objects in an area at once
raise:
Craft items in the hideout
1 point per 8 hours of crafting
1 point per craft upon the end of production for alternating between 2 different crafting recipes in the same module
Crafting a single recipe repeatedly in the same module will give no points.
1 point per 8 hours of crafting
1 point per craft upon the end of production for alternating between 2 different crafting recipes in the same module
Crafting a single recipe repeatedly in the same module will give no points.

name: Designated Marksman Rifles
description: Designated Marksman Rifle handling skill improves the overall handling, reduces recoil and reload time of DMRs.
raise: Landing hits on enemies with Designated marksman rifles
Reloading Designated marksman rifles

name: Covert Movement
description: Covert movement makes your steps quieter and reduces the sound radius.
effects: Increases the speed of covert movement
Sound of steps on common surfaces is quieter
Noises produced by weapons and equipment are quieter
Elite level: Covert movement becomes equally quiet on all surfaces
raise:
Walking with less than 25% speed, the speaker icon needs to have no bar
Skill points will be gained as long as any motion is occurring, gain is equal whether crouched or standing.
Skill points will be gained as long as any motion is occurring, gain is equal whether crouched or standing.

name: Field Medicine
description: Field surgery expertise facilitates application of splints and bandages and reduces the chance of repeated bleeding.

name: Weapon Modding
description: Skill of basic weapon modding on the go increases the mod ergonomics and reduces silencer wear.

name: Silent Operations
description: The skill of staying undetected in all aspects of the raid operation through improved melee speed and reduced volume of doors and looting sounds.

name: Heavy Machine Guns
description: Heavy machinegun handling skill improves the overall handling, reduces recoil and reload time of Heavy Machine Guns.
raise: Landing hits on enemies with Heavy Machine Guns
Reloading Heavy Machine Guns

name: Endurance
description: Endurance influences the amount of stamina and the rate of exhaustion while running or jumping, as well as holding and restoring breath.
effects: Decreases jump stamina drain (-30% at Elite Level)
Increases holding breath time (+100% at Elite Level)
Elite level: Breathing is independent of energy
raise: Sprinting while  not being overweight
Walking while not being overweight (i.e yellow or red)

name: Strength
description: Increasing strength allows you to jump higher, sprint faster, hit harder, throw farther, and carry more weight.
effects: Aiming drains less stamina (+20% at elite level)
Increases jump height (+20% at elite level)
Increases carrying weight (+30% at elite level → 91 kg)
Increases melee strike power (+30% at elite level)
Increases movement and sprint speed (+20% at elite level)
Increases throw distance (+20% at elite level)
Elite level: Weapons, body armor and chest rigs are now weightless
Elite level: Chance to deal critical melee damage (50%)
raise:
Using throwable weapons (3 skill points limit per raid):
129% progression speed: The first 7 grenades give 1.3 skill point (+0.195 skill point per grenade)
100% progression speed: Once 1.3 skill points are earned, the next 7 grenades (8 to 14) give 1 skill point (+0.15 skill point per grenade)
50% progression speed: Once 2.3 skill points are earned, every subsequent grenade gives +0.075 skill point per throw
